member.name: T:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer
member.summary: Blazor component for visualizing audio data.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.OnContainerMouseOver
member.summary: Invoked when the mouse pointer enters the container area.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.OnContainerMouseOut
member.summary: Invoked when the mouse pointer leaves the container area.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.OnVisualizerMouseOver
member.summary: Invoked when the mouse pointer enters the visualizer area.

member.summary: Invoked when the mouse pointer leaves the visualizer area.

member.summary: Invoked when a preset is applied to the visualizer.

member.summary: Invoked when the gradient used by the visualizer is changed.

member.summary: Invoked when the features of the visualizer change.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.IsPlayingChanged
member.summary: Invoked when playing status changed

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.OnInputConnected
member.summary: Invoked when an input source is connected to the visualizer.

member.summary: Invoked when the visualizer component is created.

member.summary: Invoked when the visualizer component is ready for interaction.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.OverlayChildContent
member.summary: Indicates whether child content should be overlaid on the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ClickAction
member.summary: Defines the action taken when the visualizer is clicked.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.DoubleClickAction
member.summary: Defines the action taken when the visualizer is double-clicked.

member.summary: Defines the action taken when the context menu is invoked on the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.MouseWheelUpAction
member.summary: Defines the action taken when the mouse wheel is scrolled up over the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.MouseWheelDownAction
member.summary: Defines the action taken when the mouse wheel is scrolled down over the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ShowPresetNameOnChange
member.summary: Determines whether the name of the preset is shown when it is changed.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.InitialPreset
member.summary: Specifies the initial preset to be applied to the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Presets
member.summary: All here added presets will be available for the user to apply to the visualizer by using mousewheel.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.BackgroundImage
member.summary: Sets the background image of the visualizer component.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.IgnoredPropertiesForReset
member.summary: If a preset is applied this properties will be ignored when the preset is applied and a reset is triggered from the preset.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ChildContent
member.summary: The content to be rendered within the visualizer component. All here containing audio and video elements will be connected to the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Features
member.summary: Array of visualizer features to be applied to the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.AudioElements
member.summary: An array of audio elements (e.g., audio or video tags) to be visualized.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ConnectAllAudioSources
member.summary: A flag indicating whether all audio sources should be connected to the visualizer.

member.summary: CSS class for the visualizer component.

member.summary: CSS class for the visualizer component.

member.summary: Opacity of the visualizer component.

member.summary: Opacity of the visualizer component when hovered.

member.summary: Connects the microphone to the visualizer.

member.summary: Height of the visualizer component.

member.summary: Width of the visualizer component.

member.summary: Applies the given preset to the visualizer.

member.summary: Displays a message on the visualizer for the specified duration.

member.summary: Removes a visualizer feature from the visualizer.

member.summary: Removes a visualizer feature from the visualizer.

member.summary: Removes a visualizer feature from the visualizer.

member.summary: Adds a visualizer feature to the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Radius
member.summary: Defines the internal radius of the radial spectrum. Must be between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Sensitivity
member.summary: Sets the sensitivity of the visualizer. Higher values make it more sensitive to sound.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ChannelLayout
member.summary: Specifies the channel layout for the visualizer (e.g., single, dual-vertical).

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Stereo
member.summary: Determines whether to use stereo mode, changing the channel layout accordingly.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.FrequencyScale
member.summary: Specifies the frequency scale used by the visualizer (e.g., logarithmic, linear).

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.FFTSize
member.summary: Sets the FFT size for the audio processing. Higher values provide more detail.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.MaxDecibels
member.summary: Sets the maximum decibel level for the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.MinDecibels
member.summary: Sets the minimum decibel level for the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.MaxFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the maximum frequency displayed by the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.MinFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the minimum frequency displayed by the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Smoothing
member.summary: Controls the smoothing time constant for the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Volume
member.summary: Adjusts the volume for the audio processing.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.WeightingFilter
member.summary: Applies a weighting filter for the frequency data visualization.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Mode
member.summary: Sets the visualization mode for the audio spectrum (e.g., discrete frequencies).

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.MaxFPS
member.summary: Limits the maximum frames per second (FPS) for the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ReflexRatio
member.summary: Adjusts the ratio of the reflex effect in the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.RoundBars
member.summary: Enables or disables round bars in the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ShowBgColor
member.summary: Controls the background color visibility of the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ShowFPS
member.summary: Toggles the display of frames per second (FPS) on the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ShowPeaks
member.summary: Determines whether amplitude peaks are shown in the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ShowScaleX
member.summary: Controls the visibility of the scale on the X-axis.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ShowScaleY
member.summary: Controls the visibility of the scale on the Y-axis.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.SpinSpeed
member.summary: Sets the rotation speed for the radial visualization mode.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.SplitGradient
member.summary: Splits the color gradient between left and right channels in dual layouts.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.IsActive
member.summary: Controls whether the visualizer is active and starts processing audio immediately.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.TrueLeds
member.summary: When true, renders LED bars with individual colors from the current gradient.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.UseCanvas
member.summary: Determines whether the visualizer uses a canvas for rendering.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ColorMode
member.summary: Selects the color mode for the visualizer bars.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Gradient
member.summary: Specifies the color gradient used for the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.GradientLeft
member.summary: Specifies the color gradient for the left channel (dual layouts only).

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.GradientRight
member.summary: Specifies the color gradient for the right channel (dual layouts only).

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.AlphaBars
member.summary: Enables or disables alpha transparency for the bars based on their amplitude.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.AnsiBands
member.summary: Uses ANSI/IEC preferred frequencies for octave bands (affects visualization modes).

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.BarSpacing
member.summary: Adjusts the spacing between bars in the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.BgAlpha
member.summary: Controls the background opacity of the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.FillAlpha
member.summary: Sets the fill opacity for bars or the graph area in the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.LedBars
member.summary: Toggles the LED bars effect for the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.LinearAmplitude
member.summary: Switches the amplitude scale from decibels to a linear representation.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.LinearBoost
member.summary: Boosts low-energy frequencies in linear amplitude mode.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.LineWidth
member.summary: Sets the line width for graph mode or the outline of bars.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.LoRes
member.summary: Enables low-resolution mode to improve performance on high-DPI displays.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.LumiBars
member.summary: Enables luminance bars effect, displaying bars at full height with varying opacity.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Mirror
member.summary: Configures the mirroring effect for the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.NoteLabels
member.summary: Displays musical note labels instead of frequency values on the X-axis.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.OutlineBars
member.summary: Renders analyzer bars with an outline.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Overlay
member.summary: Enables the overlay mode, allowing the visualizer to be displayed over other content.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.PeakLine
member.summary: Connects peak values with a line in graph mode.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.Radial
member.summary: Enables the radial visualization mode.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.RadialInvert
member.summary: Inverts the direction of radial bars towards the center.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ReflexAlpha
member.summary: Sets the opacity for the reflex effect in the visualizer.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ReflexBright
member.summary: Adjusts the brightness for the reflex effect.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ReflexFit
member.summary: Determines whether the reflex effect should fit the canvas height.

member.summary: Adds an audio element to the visualizer.

member.summary: Removes an audio element from the visualizer.

member.summary: Sets the audio elements to be visualized.

member.summary: Connects the microphone to the visualizer.

member.name: M:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.DisconnectFromMicrophone
member.summary: Disconnects the microphone from the visualizer.

member.name: M:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.ToggleFullScreen
member.summary: Toggles the full screen mode and returns true if the current state is full screen otherwise false.

member.name: M:AuralizeBlazor.Auralizer.TogglePictureInPicture
member.summary: Toggles the picture in picture mode and returns true if the current state is picture in picture otherwise false.

member.summary: Gets the JavaScript arguments to pass to the component.

member.summary: Applies a random preset from the Presets to the visualizer.

member.summary: Applies the next preset from the Presets to the visualizer.

member.summary: Applies the previous preset from the Presets to the visualizer.

member.summary: Called playing status changed

member.summary: Called when the gradient is changed.

member.name: T:AuralizeBlazor.AuralizerPreset
member.summary: The AuralizerPreset class is used to define a set of properties that can be applied to an Auralizer instance.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.AuralizerPreset.ResetToDefaultFirst
member.summary: This is true by default. If this value is false, the default values are not applied before applying the preset.

member.summary: Show the peak energy bar.

member.summary: If true the treble energy bar will be shown, otherwise it will be hidden.

member.summary: The text to show for the midrange energy bar.

member.summary: The text to show for the treble energy bar.

member.summary: Position of the label.

member.name: T:AuralizeBlazor.Features.SwitchPresetFeature
member.summary: This feature allows to switch between different presets based on bass energy.

member.summary: The minimum time in milliseconds between two consecutive switch events.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Features.SwitchPresetFeature.MinEnergy
member.summary: The minimum energy level required to trigger a switch event.

member.name: P:AuralizeBlazor.Features.SwitchPresetFeature.PickRandom
member.summary: If true the preset will be picked randomly, otherwise the next preset will be selected.
